snippet: The United States gymnastics national championships began Thursday in St. Louis, the first of two steps toward London for American competitors.
abstract: United States gymnastics national championships begins, the first step toward the 2012 Olympics for American competitors; making the Olympic team this year will prove harder than years past, since the International Gymnastics Federation made each squad smaller to provide more Olympic berths to individual gymnasts from counties that do not field a full team.
lead_paragraph: The United States gymnastics national championships began Thursday in St. Louis, the first of two steps toward London for American competitors.

headline.seo: On the Road to the Olympics, U.S. Gymnasts Find Rush-Hour Traffic
headline.main: U.S. Gymnasts in a Jam on the Road to London
headline.print_headline: U.S. Gymnasts in a Jam On the Road to London
